thread.title: Nigerian president Buhari to seek re-election in 2019

title: Nigerian president Buhari to seek re-election in 2019
text:
Nigerian president Buhari to seek re-election in 2019 2:53am EDT - 01:27 
Nigeria’s President Muhammadu Buhari confirmed on Monday he will seek another term in elections next year, ending months of speculation about his future after bouts of ill health. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Nigeria’s President Muhammadu Buhari confirmed on Monday he will seek another term in elections next year, ending months of speculation about his future after bouts of ill health.
